entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0150.9876] The disclosure 995494 - Disclosure - Note 13 - Business Segment Information - Segment Reporting Information (Details) includes an inconsistent addition of a dimensional member. The value of the concept us-gaap:Assets represents the sum of consolidation item members with a total of 90,603,000. The value of the total should be greater than or equal to the sum of the values of the consolidated items with a value of 154,913,000. The values for the component dimensions are as follows:
Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=awx:OperatingSegmentsAndCorporateNonSegmentMember with a value of 168,061,000. Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:IntersegmentEliminationMember with a value of -77,458,000. Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:CorporateNonSegmentMember with a value of 64,310,000.
The addends are calculated based on the members on the consolidated items linkbase defined for 995494 - Disclosure - Note 13 - Business Segment Information - Segment Reporting Information (Details).
Total Element : us-gaap:Assets Total Value : 90,603,000 Total period : 2024-03-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9876 Rule version: 26.0.9 - awx20240331_10q.htm 6553

[DQC.US.0150.9876] The disclosure 995494 - Disclosure - Note 13 - Business Segment Information - Segment Reporting Information (Details) includes an inconsistent addition of a dimensional member. The value of the concept us-gaap:Assets represents the sum of consolidation item members with a total of 87,965,000. The value of the total should be greater than or equal to the sum of the values of the consolidated items with a value of 153,418,000. The values for the component dimensions are as follows:
Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=awx:OperatingSegmentsAndCorporateNonSegmentMember with a value of 164,962,000. Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:IntersegmentEliminationMember with a value of -76,997,000. Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:CorporateNonSegmentMember with a value of 65,453,000.
The addends are calculated based on the members on the consolidated items linkbase defined for 995494 - Disclosure - Note 13 - Business Segment Information - Segment Reporting Information (Details).
Total Element : us-gaap:Assets Total Value : 87,965,000 Total period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9876 Rule version: 26.0.9 - awx20240331_10q.htm 6557
